LanguageData.VQEA_PawnRecruitable: {0} is no longer unwaveringly loyal due to {1}'s {2} gene.
LanguageData.VQEA_OverrideDesc: Select a colonist to override the ancient pipeline junction, siphoning a large amount of chemfuel from it. The pipeline junction will need time before it can be hacked again.
LanguageData.VQEA_OverrideDesc_Generic: Select a colonist to override the security on this.
